SEARCH
Package org.apache.struts.config

Class TestActionConfig

java.lang.Object
org.apache.struts.config.TestActionConfig
public class TestActionConfig extends Object
Unit tests for the ActionConfig class. Currently only contains code to test the methods that support configuration inheritance.
Version:
$Rev$ $Date$
